info.title: BlueprintClient
info.description: Azure Blueprints Client provides access to blueprint definitions, assignments, and artifacts, and related blueprint operations.

get.description: List operations for given blueprint assignment within a subscription.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

200.description: OK -- all blueprint assignment operations retrieved.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: assignmentOperationName
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint assignment operation.

action.description: Name of the action performed in this job.

history.description: Result of this deployment job for each retry.

requestUri.description: Reference to deployment job resource id.

AssignmentDeploymentJob.description: Represents individual job in given blueprint assignment operation.

resources.description: Resources created as result of the deployment job.

AssignmentDeploymentJobResult.description: Result of each individual deployment in a blueprint assignment.

AssignmentJobCreatedResource.description: Azure resource created from deployment job.

AssignmentOperation.description: Represents underlying deployment detail for each update to the blueprint assignment.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

assignmentState.description: State of this blueprint assignment operation.

blueprintVersion.description: The published version of the blueprint definition used for the blueprint assignment operation.

deployments.description: List of jobs in this blueprint assignment operation.

timeCreated.description: Create time of this blueprint assignment operation.

timeFinished.description: Finish time of the overall underlying deployments.

timeStarted.description: Start time of the underlying deployment.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

AzureResourceBase.description: Common properties for all Azure resources.

AssignmentOperationNameParameter.name: assignmentOperationName
AssignmentOperationNameParameter.description: Name of the blueprint assignment operation.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.
